column8: Notes
attends Pembroke College
works for Ghana's Department of Education
works as plebiscite officer for the UN
meets and marries wife
works as resident tutor
UWI Mona
attends University of Sussex
meets article author at Caribbean Arts Movement gathering
returns to Jamaica after PhD in England; accepts UWI-Mona History faculty position until 1991 when moves to NYU
accepts Visiting Professorship, Southern Illinois University
accepts Nairobi University, City of Nairobi fellowship
participates in naming ceremony
attends Carifesta I
visits Boston University
gives lecture at Carifesta II
gives lecture at Harvard
gives lecture
visits University of Mysore
visits Holy Cross College
attends London Black Book Fair
gives annual Sir Winston Scott Memorial Lecture
accepts visiting fellow position at Harvard University
visits Yale University
experiences destruction of home during Hurricane Gilbert (1988).
holds interview w/Nathaniel Mackey while Regents' Professor at UC Santa Cruz
accepts position at NYU (splits time w/Caribbean home)
holds conversation w/Nathaniel Mackey at Poets House
attends celebration for birth of Ngũgĩ wa Thiong'o's child (Spring 1994)
leaves Jamaica for NYU (splits time w/ Caribbean home)
attends conference at the University of Memphis, "The Caribbean: South of the South"
attends CARIFESTA VII 2000
attends West Indian Lit Conference at UMiami
teaches Topcs in Caribbean Lit at NYU
